channel.title: Crucible - Vector work (wallpaper version + normal)
channel.description:
Click to enlarge either [url=http://enviedart.deviantart.com/art/Crucible-90791952]Standard Version [img]http://tn3-1.deviantart.com/fs32/300W/f/2008/187/5/d/Crucible_by_EnviedArt.png[/img][/url] [url=http://enviedart.deviantart.com/art/Crucible-Desktop-90790620]Wallpaper Version (1680x1050, but easily cropable for any sized desktop) [img]http://tn3-2.deviantart.com/fs31/300W/f/2008/187/d/9/Crucible_by_EnviedArt.png[/img][/url]
C&C welcome... if its productive, and you know what you are saying. (nothing like, "c00l!" or "it sUx, m4ke it b3tt3r!!!")
EDIT: Added a non desktop version.

item.title: Crucible - Vector work (wallpaper version + normal)
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I like it much better than your other work. The colors work very well together. I do not understand what the title has in common with the piece though. I could understand something like paths or something to do with the title. It looks to me like it’s almost a story, that you read from right to left. And the lines are paths. All eventually leading to the end. I may be completely reading it wrong. But that’s what I feel it looks like.

Very nice piece. I would give you Constructive Criticism, but I’m not much for this kind of stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Crucible - Vector work (wallpaper version + normal)
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

I like it, overall its pretty nice though how do you do this?

Read full topic

item.title: Crucible - Vector work (wallpaper version + normal)
item.dc:creator: @brownsymcard brownsymcard
item.description:
@brownsymcard wrote:

Contrast is used to draw attention to a certain area. The brightness towards the right may be higher than I intended it to be, I recently turned down my monitor brightness and contrast, which could be why I see it as less contrasted than you.

Read full topic

item.title: Crucible - Vector work (wallpaper version + normal)
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

i feel the same as Fast, it looks nice, very nice in fact, but the lighting on the right is so strong in my eyes. it’s one of those things that ‘professionals’ do that i don’t understand.

Read full topic

item.title: Crucible - Vector work (wallpaper version + normal)
item.dc:creator: @brownsymcard brownsymcard
item.description:
@brownsymcard wrote:

FastBawlz:

I don’t know what it is about it, but I’m not feeling it :\

W3LL SCR3W U!!!

jk…

It is a bit different, which is probably why you don’t like it. I tried to give it a similar feel as to some flat work done by Gregory Euclide.

Read full topic

item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

I don’t know what it is about it, but I’m not feeling it :\

item.title: Crucible - Vector work (wallpaper version + normal)
item.dc:creator: @brownsymcard brownsymcard
item.description:
@brownsymcard wrote:

Thanks

I have, and it looks about equal in quality either way. I decided to go with a lower bar, because im using this desktop myself, and i felt the bar intruded on my desktop icons too much when it was in the center.

Read full topic

item.description:
